CT: [ 2.2468, 0.0297,  0.0974, 2.1790, 0.4441, 2.2327, 0.5916, 2.1970, -0.4794, -0.1444, 16.9471]

df1 = @(rf) [atan2(rf(2), rf(1)) * norm(rf(1:2)), atan2(rf(4), rf(3)) * norm(rf(3:4)), atan2(rf(6), rf(5)) * norm(rf(5:6)), atan2(rf(8), rf(7)) * norm(rf(7:8)), atan2(rf(10), rf(9)) * norm(rf(9:10))]
df2 = @(rf) [atan2(rf(2), rf(1))                , atan2(rf(4), rf(3))                , atan2(rf(6), rf(5))                , atan2(rf(8), rf(7))                , atan2(rf(10), rf(9))                 ]

distance with touches
squareform(pdist(vertcat([-0.1922, 0.4098,  0.0643, 0.4351, 0.3081, 0.7909, 0.6356, 0.4947,  0.0323, -0.0265, 22.4824],[-0.9853, 0.5769, -0.2345, 0.5045, 0.3931, 1.7264, 0.6548, 1.5409, -0.0351,  0.0951, 18.9064],[-0.0829, 0.0753, -0.0241, 0.1000, 0.0596, 0.1864, 0.1353, 0.1125,  0.0199, -0.0411, 25.2415],[-0.0256, 0.1453,  0.0598, 0.1453, 0.1810, 0.1856, 0.2307, 0.1131, -0.0173,  0.0229, 24.8904],[-0.9401, 0.5321, -0.1281, 0.6717, 0.3716, 1.5936, 0.5478, 1.4870,  0.0323, -0.2252, 19.4081],[-0.0139, 0.0967, -0.0604, 0.0394, 0.0447, 0.1135, 0.0874, 0.0626,  0.0186, -0.0431, 25.5276])))

distance by behavior

distance by behavior sans direction
